title: Eine neue App

embed.description: About this project You want to know when your next IP bonus is waiting for you? You want to improve your performance as a summoner in League of Legends or even compare your performance with friends in a ranking? Check these and other activities on your smartphone.

body:
Hey,
habt ihr schon vom LoL Bonus Tracker App gehört?
Was meint ihr denn zu, bzw was haltet ihr denn von?
